text: BEFORE the war he urged the British people to welcome Hitler's troops as tourists. After the war he favoured a preventive war against Russia. Now he wants Britain to demolish her defences. Throughout the years Lord Russell and his supporters have been able to pursue their eccentric campaigns in freedom. They should ask themselves this question: How long would that freedom last if their policies were adopted?
handwritten_text: BEFORE the war he urged the British people to welcome Hitler's troops as tourists. After the war he favoured a preventive war against Russia. Now he wants Britain to demolish her defences. Throughout the years Lord Russell and his supporters have been able to pursue their eccentric campaigns in freedom. They should ask themselves this question: How long would that freedom last if their policies were adopted?
